                    throws CloudProvisioningException
Converts a standard IP address to a long-format IP address.

Returns:

Throws:
CloudProvisioningException - Indicates the given IP is invalid

ipCIDR2Range

public static String ipCIDR2Range(String ipCidr)
                           throws UnknownHostException,
                                  CloudProvisioningException
Converts a CIDR IP format to an IP range format (e.g. 192.168.9.60/31 becomes 192.168.9.60 - 192.168.9.61)

Parameters:
ipCidr - IP addresses formatted as CIDR
Returns:
IP addresses formatted as a simple range
Throws:
UnknownHostException - Indicates the given IP cannot be resolved
CloudProvisioningException - Indicates the given IP is invalid

Validates a standard IP address (dotted decimal format).

true if valid, false if invalid

validateConnection

public static void validateConnection(String ipAddress,
                                      int port)
                               throws IOException
Validates a connection can be made to the given address and port, within the given time limit.

Parameters:
ipAddress - The IP address to connect to
port - The port number to use
Throws:
IOException - Reports a failure to connect or resolve the given address.

validateConnection

public static void validateConnection(String ipAddress,
                                      int port,
                                      int timeout)
                               throws IOException
Validates a connection can be made to the given address and port, within the given time limit.

Parameters:
ipAddress - The IP address to connect to
port - The port number to use
timeout - The time to wait before timing out, in seconds
Throws:
IOException - Reports a failure to connect or resolve the given address.

resolveHostNameToIp

public static String resolveHostNameToIp(String hostName)
                                  throws UnknownHostException
Resolves the host name and returns its IP address.

Parameters:
hostName - The name of the host
Returns:
The IP address of the host
Throws:
UnknownHostException - Indicates the host doesn't represent an available network object
